page.title: 17ARTS AND CRAFTS IN THE AREA
page.content: A long time resident of Naunton Beauchamp described her village as 'hobbyists generally as there are many retired people'. Retired or not the area can produce a thatcher, 2 landscape architects, an upholsterer who does boat fittings and many tailors and dressmakers. A local farmer's wife is renowned as an expert lecturer in flower arranging. There is also a taxidermist, calligrapher and a painter of animals and flowers. For the last few years a group of local ladies have been singing regularly as the Lenchton Ladies Choir at functions and church services. It would be fair to say that whilst there are no organised Art / Craft Clubs there are many talented individuals who give and gain great enjoyment from their activities.
